verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In awe of You we worship
We stand amazed at Your great love
You reign from Glory to Glory
We set our hearts on You our God

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Now Your presence fills this place
Be exalted in our praise
As we worship
We believe You are near

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Blessings and honor
And glory and power
Forever, forever
